title: Deep Learning Practical Competency Enhancement: Corporate Management Simulation Game: Overcoming Uncertainty and Creative Problem-Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of business management concepts (e.g., marketing, finance, human resource management)
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can establish integrated management strategies for core business operations (finance, marketing, human resources).
Learners can enhance their ability to solve problems through creative decision-making in uncertain in-game situations.
Learners can gain experience in conflict management and resource allocation optimization through team-based collaboration.
Learners can emulate entrepreneurial thinking and leadership through self-directed reflection.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
